original_text: The building that was facing the separate yard on the west side was seventy cubits broad, and the wall of the building was five cubits thick all around, and its length ninety cubits.
korean_text: 서쪽 뜰 뒤에 건물이 있는데 너비는 일흔 척이요 길이는 아흔 척이며 그 사방 벽의 두께는 다섯 척이더라

sentences.original_text: The building faced the separate yard on the west side.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 건물은 서쪽에 있는 구별된 뜰을 향하고 있었고

sentences.original_text: The wall of the building was five cubits thick all around.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 건물의 벽은 사면이 모두 다섯 규빗 두꺼웠고
